item.title: Curry Aioli
item.description: Ingredients: 2 Tbsp mayonnaise 1 clove of garlic (grated) 1 tsp lemon juice ½ tsp curry powder ¼ tsp salt ¼ tsp pepper Instructions: Combine all ingredients in a bowl and mix.

item.title: Phisch's BBQ Sauce
item.description: Ingredients: 1 cup ketchup 1 shallot (finely diced) subst: red onions 1 clove garlic (finely diced) 1 inch ginger (finely diced) 1 tbsp sunflower oil 1 tsp chili flakes 1½ tbsp. brown sugar 3 tsp smoked paprika 1½ tbsp. apple cider vinegar subst: red wine vinegar 1 tsp worchestorshire sauce 2 tbsp dark soy sauce black pepper salt Instructions: Add shallots, garlic, ginger, sunflower oil, and chili flakes to pan on medium heat.

item.title: White Wine Sauce
item.description: Ingredients (pasta, chicken, and tomatoes): 1 lb pasta 300 g chicken thighs (cut into bite-size pieces) 1 package of cherry tomatoes (halved) ½ tsp salt ¼ tsp pepper Ingredients (sauce): 3 cloves of garlic (minced) ¼ cup extra virgin olive oil 5 Tbsp butter (unsalted) ½ tsp crushed red pepper 1 tsp salt ½ tsp ground black pepper ½ cup white wine (your choice thereof) Instructions (chicken and tomatoes): If you’re having this with pasta, go ahead and cook that, chill with water, and set to the side.

item.title: Chicken Marinade
item.description: Ingredients: 1 Cup Soy sauce ¼ Cup Worchestorshire sauce ¼ Cup Brown Sugar 3 cloves of garlic (minced) Instructions: Throw all the chicken in a ziplock bag with the marinade, store in fridge, and use as needed.
